name: Project Galaxmon
description:
I wanted this demo to something I could showcase in a Kickstarter campaign; unfortunately various circumstances (low funds mainly) prevented me from completing the demo as I had originally intended. Due to how much I had to cut out and not being able to gather a team (mainly programmers and spriters), I decided to cancel any plans for a Kickstarter campaign and put the video game part of the project on hold.  You can read more here: Project Galaxmon Site

Thank you for taking time out of your day to play the demo and hope you leave some criticism (no matter how harsh), on how I can improve the concept of my project.

Notice

If the game doesn't run on your computer (Mac or Linux is a for sure no), I will be unable to help you.
